ygData.subject: RE: lodge of the dead fac
ygData.msgSnippet: The NPCs are indifferent to me, but he won t give me the box because I do not serve the dead well enough. The box is now no drop so a friend ca t give it to me
ygData.messageBody:
The NPCs are indifferent to me, but he won't give me the box because I do
not serve the dead well enough. The box is now no drop so a friend ca't give
it to me either. I guess I should have done it last week. :(

Thanks for the feedback though.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
> Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 6:05 PM
> To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> Subject: [shadowknight] lodge of the dead fac
>
>
> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> i just did a lot of fire beetle eye quests. when i first entered the lodge
> (after lvl 9.. silly neriak ghouls) the npcs were indifferent to me. but i
> had high enough initial faction to do quests. if your fac is too low to do
> quests the very first time you enter the lodge.. i don't know
> what to tell you.
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>
